death.attack.anvil: %1$s thought a falling anvil was just some daft pigeon
death.attack.anvil.player: %1$s got flattened by a dodgy anvil trap while scrapping with %2$s
death.attack.badRespawnPoint.message: %1$s got done in by %2$s (A bloody bed did 'em in...)
death.attack.cactus.player: %1$s ran headfirst into a cactus while legging it from %2$s
death.attack.cramming: %1$s got squished ‘cause everyone fancied a group hug
death.attack.dragonBreath: %1$s didn’t pack a gas mask, did they?
death.attack.drown: %1$s forgot they weren’t a bloody dolphin
death.attack.drown.player: %1$s thought they could outswim %2$s – turns out, nah
death.attack.dryout.player: %1$s weren’t allowed a water break while scrappin’ with %2$s
death.attack.explosion.player.item: %1$s got blown sky-high by wannabe creeper %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.fall: %1$s thought they could MLG like Dream. Spoiler: they couldn’t
death.attack.fall.player: %1$s helped %2$s prove gravity’s still a thing
death.attack.fallingBlock.player: %2$s gave %1$s a crash course in construction safety
death.attack.fireball: %2$s lobbed a proper spicy one at %1$s
death.attack.fireworks.player: %2$s sent %1$s off with some lovely fireworks
death.attack.fireworks.item: %1$s went out with a bang from %3$s by %2$s
death.attack.flyIntoWall: %1$s got too cosy with a wall
death.attack.freeze: %1$s didn’t let it go, and now they’re frozen solid
death.attack.generic: %1$s died in the most vanilla way possible. Boring
death.attack.lava: %1$s thought lava was just spicy water
death.attack.lava.player: %1$s tried to hide in lava from %2$s – solid plan, that
death.attack.lightningBolt.player: %1$s forgot to wear rubber while fighting %2$s
death.attack.outsideBorder: %1$s went off the map like a right muppet
death.attack.outsideBorder.player: %1$s went exploring past reason while escaping %2$s
death.attack.sonic_boom: %1$s got blasted by a dodgy bass drop
death.attack.sonic_boom.item: %1$s got wrecked by %2$s’s %3$s at full volume
death.attack.sonic_boom.player: %1$s got walloped by %2$s moving at the speed of sound
death.attack.starve.player: %1$s skipped too many meals while fighting %2$s
death.attack.sting.player: %2$s gave %1$s a free haircut – with bees
death.attack.sweetBerryBush: %1$s got poked to bits by a bush. Well done
death.attack.sweetBerryBush.player: %1$s got stuck in a prickly mess while running from %2$s
death.attack.thorns.item: %1$s got third-partied by %3$s while trying to smack %2$s
death.attack.trident.item: %1$s got poked up proper by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.wither: %1$s faded away like dust. Cheers, Thanos
death.attack.witherSkull: %1$s got blasted by %2$s (Maybe run next time...)
death.attack.witherSkull.item: %1$s got over their head from %3$s, thanks to %2$s
death.fell.accident.ladder: %1$s took a dodgy step on the ladder of life
death.fell.accident.twisting_vines: %1$s had a twisty bit of bad luck
death.fell.accident.weeping_vines: %1$s joined the vines in having a cry
death.fell.assist: %1$s was doomed to fall by the right dodgy git %2$s
death.fell.finish: %1$s got saved just to die by %2$s, unlucky
death.fell.finish.item: %1$s forgot to turn no-fall on and %2$s finished the job with %3$s
death.fell.killer: %1$s thought milk stopped fall damage. It didn’t
death.attack.mace_smash: %2$s introduced %1$s to the floor, quite violently
deathScreen.title: Bit of a bummer, that...
